table.caption: Common Cause
rows: {@b Cellmates}. The characters are prisoners in an Azorius prison, a Gruul camp, or a {@creature Rakdos|GGR} cage.
{@b Greater Threat}. The characters are fighting each other when a rampaging wurm attacks.
{@b Sudden Danger}. The characters are trapped together by a sinkhole opening, a building collapsing, or a laboratory exploding.
{@b Dream Team}. A strange dream leads each character to the same destination.
{@b Lost Together}. The characters are hopelessly lost in an unfamiliar part of the city.
{@b Detente}. By order of their guilds' leaders, the characters must cooperate to complete a secret mission.
{@b Common Foe}. A villain is a common enemy to all the characters.
{@b Do or Die}. The characters are all trying to avert the catastrophe of an all-out war among the guilds.
table.name: Building a Party; Common Cause
